item.dc:creator: @Pmh1000 Pmh1000
item.description:
@Pmh1000 wrote:

[quote=“hemeny, post:13, topic:685”][quote author=Pmh1000 link=topic=496.msg39592#msg39592 date=1148827399]
one thign that i notced when writing me own scripts on swift switch is that when your up a ladder you can look down and see whats on the ground. for ex when you climb a ladder you can see the tress flowers and buildings where in runescape from runescape.com all you see is a black area. but that shouldnt affect the way this script works. if nothing else bumis you may have to change your parameters slightly to get better results.
[/quote]

hmmm im not gonna flame

swiftswitch is automatically set to high detail
while when your on rs u probably choose low detail thats why when ur upstairs you see the trees and ground cuz ur on highdetail[/quote]Actualy No i choose low detail and swiftswitch can run in both low and high detail depending on what you click on, but this has nothign to do with the topic so im not going to discuss it any further. Cant We All Just Get Along…

item.title: [RS2] BumTokel Advanced 2.1 [Updated sence last night]
item.dc:creator: @jubjub01 jubjub01
item.description:
@jubjub01 wrote:

For those ppl who were saying it dident click on the cave here is what to add (I hope this is ok Bumis)

Procedure OutSideCave; Begin DoingMain:=1 Review; Status('Finding Cave') If FindColorTolerance(x,y,cave,0,0,466,299,5) Then Begin MMouse(x,y,5,5) Wait(50+Random(50)) GetMousePos(x,y) MMouse(x,y,2,2) Wait(150+Random(200)) If IsTextInAreaEx(4,4,25,25,x,y,'Enter',100,UpChars,True,false,0,1,13224393) then Begin GetMousePos(x,y) ClickMouse(x,y,True) MMouse(647,184,5,5) Wait(300+Random(300)) GetMousePos(x,y) ClickMouse(x,y,true) Wait(500+random(500)) FindStrangeBox; CaveEntered:=CaveEntered+1 Review; InTheCave; End; End; ClickMouse(x,y,true) DoingMain:=0 End;

Read full topic

@Dizzy wrote:

hemeny:

yah just stands there is it swift switch compatible

Yes, it’s swiftswitch compatible… All swiftswitch is, just a client that connects to the same url as the normal runescape client. (Or for more understandable. It’s basiclly the same exact thing as the runescape client you download from runescape.com - but with actuall features.) Hope that helped.

item.title: [RS2] BumTokel Advanced 2.1 [Updated sence last night]
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

[code]

[CHANGES FROM 2.0: SPECIAL ATTACK, BOX BREAKER FIXED, SCAR DISGUISE]

Someone posted that they didn’t like how the mouse moved, and that they didn’t like the fact that they woke up with a bunch of boxes…

Guess what? Problem solved. The new version now does random special attacks when it can, does the box random event, moves the mouse much more human-like, checks experiance and inventory once in a while to seem more human.

Just stand outside the tokel mini game, High/Low Detail (Best used on the darkest setting), your character will enter the cave, over and over, giving you tokuls and experiance.

Enjoy. First script I put a slight bit of effort into. This one took me over an hour

[Code]
{
#BumTokel Advanced 2.1

Simulates human like behavior.

Uses BoxBreaker2 Include to avoid Boxes!

Does special attack randomly.

  • Stand outside the Tokel Minigame Cave, with
  • map facing south/up, so you can see the cave
  • then run the script. Your character will fight
  • to the death over and over, collecting you tokuls
  • giving you fighting experiance
    }

program BumTokuler;
{.include SSI2.txt}
{.include BoxBreaker2.txt}
var
cave: Integer;
CaveEntered: Integer;
InvenCount,RandomInven,DoInvenCount,CheckFighting: Integer;
DoingInven,DoingMain,CheckStats,CheckingStats: Integer;
IAmFighting,DoingSpecial: Boolean;
Procedure Variables;
Begin
Cave:=9277080
UpChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsRS22’);
ChatChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsChat2’);
CaveEntered:=0
InvenCount:=0
End;

Procedure Review;
Begin
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::’)
Writeln(’: BumTokul v2.1’)
Writeln(’: You have entered the cave ’ + IntToStr(CaveEntered) + ’ times.’)
If DoingInven=1 Then
Begin
Writeln(’: Current Process: Doing Inventory’)
End;
If DoingMain=1 Then
Begin
Writeln(’: Current Process: Doing Main Procedure’)
End;
If IAmFighting=True Then
Begin
Writeln(’: Current Process: Doing Special’)
End;
If CheckingStats=1 Then
Begin
Writeln(’: Current Process: Checking Stats’)
End;
Writeln(’::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
End;

Procedure DoInven;
Begin
Wait(400+Random(300))
DoInvenCount:=0
DoingInven:=1
FindStrangeBox;
Repeat
Review;
Status(‘Doing Inventory’)
DoInvenCount:=DoInvenCount+1
RandomInven:=Random(5)
Case RandomInven Of
1:
Begin
Wait(500+Random(200))
MMouse(581,225,7,7)
Wait(1000+Random(2000))
End;
2:
Begin
Wait(500+Random(200))
MMouse(611,333,20,20)
Wait(1000+Random(2000))
End;
3:
Begin
Wait(5000+Random(5000))
End;
4:
Begin
MMouse(599,323,20,20)
Wait(100+Random(100))
MMouse(394,271,20,20)
Wait(100+Random(100))
MMouse(293,108,20,20)
Wait(500+Random(500))
MoveMouseSmooth(0+random(510),0+Random(330))
End;
5:
Begin
MMouse(599,323,20,20)
Wait(100+Random(100))
MMouse(394,271,20,20)
Wait(100+Random(100))
MMouse(293,108,20,20)
Wait(500+Random(500))
MoveMouseSmooth(0+random(510),0+Random(330))
End;
End;
Until(DoInvenCount=5+random(6))
DoingInven:=0
End;

Procedure CheckSpecial;
Begin
Review;
IAmFighting:=True
Wait(1300+Random(400))
MMouse(200,200,75,75)
Wait(500+Random(100))
MMouse(559,186,5,5)
Wait(400+Random(200))
GetMousePos(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,true)
If FindColorTolerance(x,y,1203866,615,440,641,452,10) Then
Begin
DoingSpecial:=True
Review;
MoveMouseSmooth(577+Random(110),442+Random(11))
Wait(1000+Random(400))
GetMousePos(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,true)
Wait(5000+random(1400))
CheckFighting:=0
End;
IAmFighting:=False
DoingSpecial:=False
Review;
End;

Procedure AmIFighting;
Begin
If FindColorTolerance(x,y,65280,187,30,419,243,10) Then
Begin
IAmFighting:=True
Review;
CheckSpecial;
End;
IAmFighting:=False
Review;
End;

Procedure CheckMyStats;
Begin
Wait(500+Random(500))
MMouse(583,186,7,7)
Wait(200+Random(100))
GetMousePos(x,y)
MMouse(x,y,2,2)
Wait(200+Random(200))
MoveMouseSmooth(559+Random(50),212+Random(80))
Wait(500+Random(300))
GetMousePos(x,y)
MMouse(x,y,2,2)
End;

Procedure InTheCave;
Begin
DoingMain:=1
Status(‘Main Procedure’)
Review;
Wait(500+random(2000))
GetMousePos(x,y)
MMouse(x,y,2,2)
Wait(1000+Random(3000))
Begin
MMouse(361,233,77,77)
Wait(100+Random(400))
GetMousePos(x,y)
MMouse(x,y,5,5)
Wait(100+Random(400))
GetMousePos(x,y)
MMouse(x,y,3,3)
Wait(100+Random(400))
MMouse(250,150,250,150)
If CheckStats=7+Random(2) Then
Begin
CheckingStats:=1
Review;
CheckMyStats;
CheckStats:=0
End;
InvenCount:=InvenCount+1
CheckFighting:=CheckFighting+1
If CheckFighting=1+Random(4) Then
Begin
CheckFighting:=0
DoingMain:=0
Review;
AmIFighting;
End;
If InvenCount=6+Random(4) Then
Begin
MMouse(650,183,4,4)
DoingMain:=0
DoInven;
End;

Review;
End;
DoingMain:=0
End;

Procedure OutSideCave;
Begin
DoingMain:=1
Review;
Status(‘Finding Cave’)
If FindColorTolerance(x,y,cave,0,0,466,299,5) Then
Begin
MMouse(x,y,5,5)
Wait(50+Random(50))
GetMousePos(x,y)
MMouse(x,y,2,2)
Wait(150+Random(200))
If IsTextInAreaEx(4,4,25,25,x,y,‘Enter’,100,UpChars,True,false,0,1,13224393) then
Begin
GetMousePos(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,True)
MMouse(647,184,5,5)
Wait(300+Random(300))
GetMousePos(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,true)
Wait(500+random(500))
FindStrangeBox;
CaveEntered:=CaveEntered+1
Review;
InTheCave;
End;
End;
DoingMain:=0
End;

begin
Variables;
IAmFighting:=False
DisguiseSCAR(‘Windows Media Player’)
BoxOpenerSetup;
Repeat
Review;
OutSideCave;
Wait(1000+Random(500))
InTheCave;
Until(False)
end.[/Code]
